explorecats.title: Browse by Category
explorecats.subtitle: Explore the latest arrivals at Eleganza Bridal to discover your ideal prom dress for 2024, showcasing a variety of styles and lengths. From understated and chic prom dresses to the trendiest cocktail dress designs, we offer a stunning array of looks that will capture your heart. Whether your in search of a sweeping mermaid prom gown, a stylish knee-length cocktail ensemble, a charming homecoming dress, a distinctive wedding gown, or an elegant floor-length ball gown, Eleganza Bridal is your destination for the most coveted dress styles crafted by renowned designers, all at a fraction of the cost!

widgetone.descrp: Our goal is to provide convenience and help while you are looking for the perfect dress for any special occasion.

bannerone.title: Quinceañera Dresses
bannerone.subtitle: At Eleganza Bridal, we believe that every special occasion deserves a dress that is equally special and unique.

bannertwo.title: Wedding Dresses
bannertwo.subtitle: We are a dedicated team of fashion experts ready to help you make your quinceañera or wedding dreams come true.

bannerthree.title: Tuxedos For Men
bannerthree.subtitle: Our passion is to help you find the perfect outfit that will make you feel radiant on one of the most important days of your life.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: We are a passionate team dedicated to providing the best services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.parone: We strive to become the #1, one stop shop: for wedding dresses, tuxedos, quinceañera dresses, supplies, prom dresses, evening gowns, baptismal, and much more. Need more? We also plan your entire wedding,
mission.partwo: quinceañera, special event, or banquets! We make your special day into an unforgettable event & transform the way you and your family celebrate special occasions.

quiz.subtitle: At Eleganza Bridal, we not only sell dresses, but we are also part of a community of people who value beauty, elegance, and celebrating special moments. Follow us on social media to stay up to date with the latest trends and to join our community.

trending.title: Our Collection of Fabulous Dresses
trending.subtitle: Take a look at our latest arrivals and keep up with all the new fashion trends.

fabulous.title: We have everything you might need for any occasion
fabulous.subtitle: At Eleganza Bridal, we understand that each person is unique, and that is reflected in our varied collection of dresses. Whether you are looking for a traditional wedding dress, a modern and chic one, or the quinceañera dress of your dreams, we have something special for you.

boxone.title: Wedding dresses
boxone.subtitle: From princess dresses with voluminous skirts to bohemian lace dresses, our collection of wedding dresses covers a wide range of styles and sizes. We work with renowned designers to offer you quality and elegance in every seam.

boxtwo.title: Quinceañera Dresses
boxtwo.subtitle: Celebrating your fifteen years is an important event and you deserve the perfect dress. We have a beautiful variety of quinceañera dresses in every color and style imaginable. Our dresses are designed to make you feel like the princess you are.

boxthree.title: Tuxedos
boxthree.subtitle: You already have the perfect dress now find an equally amazing tuxedo to match your spouse.
